description:
Next generation photogrammetry software for professional drone and terrestrial mapping


Bug fixes and improvements
- Fixed a crash on project opening
- Fixed a crash that occurred when importing an unsupported or corrupted .las file
- Fixed an issue with opening projects from network drives on Windows
- Fixed an issue where the orthoplane was not displayed in the Section view
- Fixed an issue where successfully calibrated cameras were incorrectly displayed as uncalibrated in the 2D view
- Fixed an issue where projects not using meters would show incorrect metrics in the report panel
- Fixed an issue with incorrect file names when exporting the mesh in Cesium format from a project with special characters in its name
1.80.0
New Capabilities
- Faster mesh generation:Â Mesh generation is 20% faster in version 1.81 when compared to earlier versions.
Additional Updates and Improvements
- Polygons passed to the DSM generation are now used to estimate the automatic region of interest
- The mesh quality setting is now saved in the processing template
- Improved densification normals quality for some datasets, mostly drone datasets with larger GSD.
- Better point cloud completeness for mixed aerial and terrestrial datasets
- Improved performance when adding new layers, placing markers, and creating geometry in projects with a large number of existing layers
- Improve the zoom behavior in the 3D view when using a touchpad
Bug Fixes
- Paths have been removed from processing templates
- Bug fixes in DSM generation
- Fixed an issue where some onboardings in the toolbar would be shown again after confirmation
- Fixed "Import images from folder" not working
- Fixed bad GCP matches being added by default to the merge projects dialog
- Fixed pixels being non-square in the full-screen view of the image viewer
- Fixed an issue where automarking would fail to properly center images in full-screen mode
- Fixed some UI components being disabled after a failed import of a PIX4Dmapper project
- Fixed JPEG compressed TIFF images not being displayed in the image viewer
- Fixed an issue where the Welcome view did not suggest a project CRS based on the imported images when a default CRS was set and the corresponding checkbox was unchecked
- Fixed some issues related to the inventory snapshots of the custom report:
  - Volumes are now rendered with the volume tin
  - Circles are now always fully visible
- Fixed an issue where the point cloud registration onboarding would be hidden if the content panel is docked to the right or as a window
- Fixed an issue where the export image geolocations & orientations dialog would truncate text for some languages
- Fixed an issue where closing some projects while they are currently loading could cause a crash and data loss.
- Fixed a crash that would occur when creating geometries in the 2D view if automatic tie points were not loaded
- Fixed an issue where layers would stay disabled after editing a vertex
- Layers, point clouds, and orthomosaics that are importing or processing no longer show in the content panel until they are finished
- Fixed the UI freezing when selecting a large closed polyline
